rows.business_item_long_description: Google Cloud Platform offers a suite of cloud computing services including computing, data storage, data analytics, and machine learning, enabling organizations to build, deploy, and scale applications efficiently.
Google Workspace provides cloud-based productivity and collaboration tools such as Gmail, Docs, Drive, Calendar, and Meet, designed to enhance business communication and teamwork.
Google Cloud offers AI-optimized infrastructure including specialized hardware and software designed to accelerate machine learning and artificial intelligence applications for enterprises.

rows.business_item_short_description: Tools and frameworks for AI development
rows.business_item_long_description: The AI development platform provides developers with tools, APIs, and frameworks to build, train, and deploy AI models and applications efficiently on Google Cloud.
Assistive agents are AI-driven virtual assistants and chatbots that help businesses automate customer service, improve user engagement, and streamline operations.

rows.business_item_short_description: Software applications hosted on the cloud
rows.business_item_long_description: Google Cloud offers a variety of cloud-hosted applications that support business functions such as data analytics, security, and application development.
Google Cloud provides access to pre-trained AI models and tools to customize models for specific business needs, enabling faster deployment of AI solutions.
Google Cloud offers a range of business productivity tools designed to improve efficiency, collaboration, and workflow automation within organizations.
Google Search is a widely used web search engine that organizes and makes information universally accessible and useful to users worldwide.

rows.business_item_short_description: Online video sharing and streaming platform
rows.business_item_long_description: YouTube is a platform for uploading, sharing, and viewing videos, offering entertainment, education, and user-generated content globally.
Android is an open-source mobile operating system used by a wide range of smartphones and devices, providing access to apps and services.
Chrome is a fast, secure, and widely used web browser that enables users to access the internet and web applications.
Gmail is a free email service offering robust spam protection, integration with other Google services, and a user-friendly interface.
Google Maps provides mapping, navigation, and location-based services to help users find places, get directions, and explore the world.

rows.business_item_short_description: Digital distribution platform for apps and media
rows.business_item_long_description: Google Play Store is a digital marketplace for downloading and purchasing apps, games, movies, books, and other digital content for Android devices.
The YouTube Partner Program enables content creators to monetize their videos through ads, channel memberships, and other revenue streams.
Moonshot projects are experimental initiatives aimed at developing breakthrough technologies and solutions to solve large-scale problems beyond core Google services.
Other Bets focuses on creating and advancing innovative technologies that have the potential to transform industries and improve lives.
Other Bets includes various subsidiaries and ventures that operate independently from Google's main business, exploring new markets and technologies.
